summary: WhatsApp Messenger is a popular messaging and voice call service owned by Meta. It allows users to send messages, make calls, and share various types of content. WhatsApp is accessed through mobile devices and computers. With over 2 billion users worldwide as of 2020, it has become a primary means of communication in many regions. The service was created by WhatsApp Inc. and acquired by Facebook (now Meta) in 2014 for a significant amount.
title: WhatsApp
